title: Trump sues JPMorgan for $5B over alleged 'debanking'
shortDescription: President Trump has sued JPMorgan and its CEO Jamie Dimon for $5 billion, accusing the bank of dropping Trump as a client for political reasons.

title: Former Fox News host Bill O’Reilly reveals illness
shortDescription: 76 year old Bill O'Reilly said he’s dealing with an undisclosed illness and pausing various media projects as he undergoes treatment.

title: What’s in Trump’s ‘framework’ Greenland deal? Here's what we know
shortDescription: Trump's announcement of a 'framework of a future deal' marks a shift after weeks of threats from the United States. Here's what we know.

title: Trump touts 'total access to Greenland'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump touted 'total access to Greenland' through a framework deal with NATO.

title: Gavin Newsom's war of words with President Trump goes global
shortDescription: California Gov. Gavin Newsom's war of words and online battles with President Donald Trump takes a global stage in Davos, Switzerland.

title: US military getting 'total access' to Greenland, Trump says
shortDescription: President Trump conceded the U.S. may not end up taking over Greenland, but said he's "getting everything" he wanted out of the Danish territory.

title: Jack Smith testifies in House committee
shortDescription: Jack Smith said he stands by his decision to prosecute President Donald Trump.

title: Trump's Greenland deal has some saying TACO again. What does it mean?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump after his speech at Davos said he had reached a deal on Greenland. That includes backing off tariffs. What does TACO mean?

title: Newsom says Trump blocked his speech in Davos
shortDescription: California Governor Gavin Newsom said President Donald Trump blocked his speech in Davos.

title: 'Just pathetic': California’s Newsom says leaders are soft on Trump
shortDescription: California Governor Gavin Newsom accused European leaders of "complicity" towards U.S. President Donald Trump's threats to take over Greenland.

title: Trump's 'Board of Peace' ceremony in Davos
shortDescription: Trump's "Board of Peace" members include Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Turkey, Belarus and more.

title: Trump says Ukraine deal 'coming soon' as he meets with Zelenskyy at Davos
shortDescription: The board was initially aimed at helping end the war between Israel and Hamas in Gaza as well as overseeing the reconstruction of the Palestinian enclave.

title: Jan. 6 prosecutor to testify on Trump cases amid Republican scrutiny
shortDescription: Jack Smith is facing Republican accusations that his cases against then-ex President Trump were politicized. Now he will testify to Congress about it.

title: Vance heads to Minnesota as Trump increases tension over immigration
shortDescription: A White House official said Vance will meet with Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents and deliver remarks praising their work.

title: Trump backs away from blowing up NATO over Greenland — for now
shortDescription: The president's push to gain control of Greenland, a Danish territory, has created anxiety about the future of the alliance throughout Europe.

title: 'Nationalism on steroids:' Trump, Catholics battle over morality
shortDescription: Since starting his second presidential term a year ago, Trump’s policies and actions have drawn ire on multiple fronts, including Vatican relations.

title: Contempt vote looms for Bill and Hillary Clinton
shortDescription: The House Oversight Committee voted to advance contempt proceedings against Bill and Hillary Clinton.

title: Trump arrives in Davos amid tensions over Greenland
shortDescription: President Donald Trump attends the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos. See him speak and mingle with global political and business leaders.

title: Meet Jack Smith, the special counsel behind the Trump investigations
shortDescription: Jack Smith, the former U.S. Justice Department Special Counsel who brought two now-dropped criminal cases against Trump, will testify on Jan. 22.

title: Watch Trump make his case to buy Greenland in Davos speech
shortDescription: During a speech at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, President Trump again made his case to make Greenland a U.S. territory.

title: Bill, Hillary Clinton to face contempt vote in Congress over Epstein
shortDescription: House lawmakers took a bipartisan step to advance criminal contempt proceedings against Bill and Hillary Clinton.

title: Trump reaches deal with NATO over Greenland
shortDescription: President Trump said he's holding off on imposing tariffs he threatened on eight European nations over Greenland after reaching framework of a deal with NATO.

title: Trump backs off tariffs after touting 'framework' for Greenland deal
shortDescription: President Trump said he's holding off on imposing tariffs he threatened on eight European nations over Greenland.

title: Trump confuses Iceland and Greenland
shortDescription: President Donald Trump seemed to confuse Greenland with Iceland during his speech in Davos, Switzerland.
